medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms presented in infancy. Patient 1 was admitted at 3 weeks of age with fever and dehydration. The 46,XY patient presented with ambiguous genitalia at birth and developed normal masculinization at puberty but was azoospermic at 18.5 years of age.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both patients have a diagnosed homozygous mutation in the HSD3B2 gene causing severe 3 beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase deficiency.
medical_history.family_history: Both patients are from related French-Canadian families; patient 1 from a reportedly consanguineous relationship.
